entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow or rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to periods of drizzle or rain showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
